core:description.text: A wrinkled notice written in surprisingly neat handwriting, though the paper has suspicious stains around the edges.

items:readable.text:
RECIPROCAL MANUAL RELEASE SERVICES OFFERED/REQUIRED

Local craftsman (53, hygiene acceptable, all digits functional) seeks partner for mutual handjob exchange. Fair trade onlyâ€”you provide, I provide, we part as gentlemen/gentlewomen. No further entanglement.

Payment: One (1) handjob of equivalent enthusiasm and duration.

Contact: Bertram the Muddy, behind the tannery after sunset.
